title: Why doesn't your program show the logo?
body: Why does your program not show the logo in the program removal application?
author: asdefasdf

comments.body: @Thavarshan must modify the iconUrl value of the Squirrel maker for it to work. The current URL is just a GitHub URL that does not show the image. The maintainer should upload the image to Cloudinary, for example, and place the URL, and that would fix it.
